replies.body: I fixed it, all I did was restarting my computer and boom it's fixed.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

Without having much more information, there's a number of different things that could be going on to cause this. 

If your connection becomes unstable after logging in, it would cause the play button to disable and turn gray because the client can't talk to our servers without a stable connection. Check out our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if we can patch up your network connection.

If your connection is all in shape, the root of the problem could be a corrupted game file. In this case, try running our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool).

Hit me back up if this doesn't help!
